description:
Kaori befriends an Austrian orphan, Hans Zeigfried who is a professional killer and dying from a fatal disease. Kaori is abducted by Hans` enemies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chinkon no Lullaby: Tooi Kuni kara Kita Kikoushi
Lullaby requiem. The young nobleman who came from a distant country
鎮魂のララバイ 遠い国から来た貴公子
